name: Large
description: This unit is treated as a Large Target. They may always be shot at with ranged weapons with a +1 modifier to hit.

name: Wizard
description: A wizard may use spells from their known list of spells. A wizard may only use one spell per turn. They may not wear armour or use shields.

name: Priest
description: A Priest may use prayers from their known list of prayers. A Priest may only use one prayer per turn. They may wear armour and use shields.
